articles.description: For the current financial year (2023-24), Prasad said Coal India may miss the production target of 780 MT (FY24) by about 10 MT. Besides. of the 780 MT, Coal India is supplying more than the targeted 610 MT to the power sector in FY24.
articles.content: Coal India Limited (CIL) has set a target to produce 838 million tons (MT) of coal in the financial year 2024-25, of which 661 MT will be supplied to the power sector alone, the state-owned company's… [+3465 chars]

articles.title: Stock split news: Canara Bank Board approves division of each share into 5 - CNBCTV18
articles.description: Canara Bank share price settled 1.5% lower at Rs 571.90 on Monday. The PSB stock has surged more than 29% this year so far, while the one-year return on the stock is 107%.

articles.title: Huge boost for India's chipmaking ambitions, govt evaluating $21 billion worth of proposals - The Times of India

articles.author: Sneha Kulkarni
articles.title: FD interest rates revised: Investors can earn up to 8.85% on FDs in this bank - The Economic Times
articles.description: RBL Bank offers interest rates between 3.50% to 8.10% for general citizens for FDs maturing between 7 days to 10 years. For senior citizens, the interest rate varies between 4% and 8.60%.
